title: Company logo
content:
This is our company's logo. Well, this is the national version, we're just a small local representative and I'm trying to make something as close as possible. I don't know who made it :\  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416032256im_/http:/www.sandroditrentotennis.it/html/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/logo-AICS_2.jpg)  
I tried to clean it up a little, not sure if this is better or worse  
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416032256im_/http:/i.imgur.com/4Ue90tg.png)

Thank you to Jan and kthomps5!

Font: 

 Futura
